Class GamePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • GamePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GamePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Holds all of the components on the game screen. Components are controlled using the get/set methods included in this class.
    Version:
    1.0 06.01.2015
    Author:
    Zachary Teper (4 hours) and Angela Zhu (1 hour)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void unpause()
